name: The Unfound Soul
description:
Unlock the ultimate power as you combine artifacts to create even more powerful ones in this turn-based roguelike adventure. Collect over 1000 weapons, armor pieces, and artifacts as you vanquish your foes and rise to the top as the ultimate soul.



Experience intricate and deep turn-based combat as you navigate through challenging levels. Test your skills and strategic planning as you discover powerful artifacts and build your ultimate arsenal. With over 1000 items to find, the possibilities are endless. Join the epic quest to become the master of artifacts and dominate the realm.
